thread.title: Brie Larson attends SAG Awards with fiancé Alex Greenwald
thread.title_full: Brie Larson attends SAG Awards with fiancé Alex Greenwald | Daily Mail Online

author: Ekin Karasin For Mailonline
title: Brie Larson attends SAG Awards with fiancé Alex Greenwald

organizations.name: prettylittlething natalia white racer neck crepe maxi dress
prettylittlething sara cream mesh floral applique maxi dress
missguided high wrap neck detail maxi dress

text:
They got engaged during a romantic trip to Tokyo last May.
And Brie Larson and Alex Greenwald looked as loved-up as ever as they attended the Screen Actors Guild Awards in Los Angeles on Sunday.
The 27-year-old actress oozed elegance in an ivory halterneck gown as she hit the red carpet alongside her handsome rocker beau, 37.
Cute couple: Brie Larson, 27, and Alex Greenwald, 37, looked as loved-up as ever as they attended the Screen Actors Guild Awards in Los Angeles on Sunday
Brie looked every inch the Hollywood starlet in the form-fitting creation, which featured an asymmetric neckline and racy front-split.
The brunette beauty wore her glossy hair in curly tendrils swept up into a tousled chignon, and plumped her pout with a taupe lipstick.
Keeping accessories to a minimum, the Room actress added height with a pair of black ankle-strap stilettos.
Simply stylish: The Room actress oozed elegance in an ivory halterneck gown as she hit the red carpet
Keep it chic in a white maxi dress like Brie Larson in Jason Wu Jason Wu Custom Gown
Click to shop the current collection!
Buy now
Brie Larson kept it simple of the red carpet at the SAG Awards this year, wearing a white halterneck maxi dress teamed with black peep toe heels and her hair swept into an updo.
A custom creation by Jason Wu, this dress is all about clean lines, featuring an asymmetric neckline, hip skimming skirt and thigh split.
We love the modernist aesthetic of this gown which makes it super wearable too. Sadly it's not available to buy but you can follow the link on the right to shop the current collection, then recreate the look with one of the picks from our edit of alternatives in the carousel below.
Style with black heels and a box clutch for a super chic monochrome ensemble.

Dapper: Alex, who is best known as lead singer of the rock band Phantom Planet but is now a member of indie pop band Phases - looked handsome in a classic black tuxedo
Turning heads: The brunette beauty wore her glossy hair in curly tendrils swept up into a tousled chignon, and plumped her pout with a taupe lipstick
Brie wrapped an arm around Alex, who is a musician, actor and record producer, while posing up a storm.
Alex, who is best known as lead singer of the rock band Phantom Planet but is now a member of indie pop band Phases - looked handsome in a classic black tuxedo.
The talented hunk proposed while the lovebirds were on vacation in Tokyo. They have been dating since 2013 and are clearly still in the honeymoon phase.
Stunning: Brie looked every inch the Hollywood starlet in the form-fitting creation, which featured an asymmetric neckline and racy front-split
Turn around, bright eyes: Brie showed off the delicate strappy back to her exquisite dress
Who, me? Brie flashed a bashful grin with her hands held dramatically to her face at one point during the ceremony
Brie has a busy year ahead as it was also announced in August that she will star in Captain Marvel as Carol Danvers, who gets special powers after an alien encounter.
'Call me Captain Marvel,' the beauty captioned an Instagram selfie a picture in July wearing a Marvel Studios cap.
She later added: 'Thanks for the love! I'm so excited to be part of the team.'
Captain Marvel will be the first film in the Marvel Cinematic Universe to center on a female character. The film is scheduled for release in March of 2019.
Having a whale of a time! Brie cosied up to actress Emma Stone at the Awards
Cheers: Emma pulled a hilarious expression of mock-hauteur as she clinked drinks with Brie
Chic:The Spiderman actress stunned in a floral gown with a dramatic lace panel
All smiles: Brie and Bryce Dallas Howard flashed their pearly whites for the camera
